file_insights.purpose: Directory index for TikTok script frameworks library
key_content: Script frameworks definition and value proposition
Library of 5 framework types (unboxing, comparison, tutorial, story-driven, review)
Universal script structure: Hook → Value Delivery → Credibility → CTA
Best practices with timing guidelines, pacing rules, language standards
Script customization guidance and common mistakes
Selection matrix by content goal, product stage, and audience intent
file_insights.structure: Hierarchical with clear sections, decision tables, and reference matrices

file_insights.purpose: Complete script framework template for product unboxing content
key_content: Framework overview with use cases and target audience
Psychological triggers explaining why unboxing works
Beat-by-beat guidance for each script section
Customization guide for different product categories
file_insights.structure: Comprehensive template with examples, visual cues, and tactical guidance

patterns_discovered.description: Both files use a teaching-first approach with definitions, rationale, and decision matrices before diving into tactical content
Consistent 4-part script structure (Hook → Value → Credibility → CTA) applied across all frameworks, making them modular and combinable
Content includes audience intent mapping, pain point alignment, and behavior-based customization guidance
Explicit KPI targets provided (completion rate 50%+, engagement 5%+, save rate 2%+, CTR 1%+) with green light/red flag indicators
Systematic coverage of common mistakes with specific fixes (burying payoff, information overload, weak endings, corporate language)
Every concept includes fill-in-the-blank examples and customization guidance for different contexts

gotchas_discovered.description: A strong hook without solid script backing leads to drop-off after hook, requiring scripts to deliver on hook promise within first 10 seconds
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Front-load value and map hook directly to opening value delivery section

gotchas_discovered.description: TikTok rewards completion rate over length; 30 seconds of solid content outperforms 60 seconds of thin content
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Prioritize one clear message per video rather than comprehensive coverage

gotchas_discovered.description: Scripts written for audio only without visual planning result in misaligned pacing and reduced engagement
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Plan visual beats alongside script beats during writing phase

gotchas_discovered.description: Professional/marketing language alienates TikTok audiences expecting conversational, authentic content
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Write scripts in conversational tone; talk like texting a friend, not pitching to customer

gotchas_discovered.description: Generic CTAs like 'check link in bio' lack motivation and fail to drive action; unclear CTA leaves viewers confused about next step
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Always include specific, motivated action with clear benefit connection

approach_outcome.approach_summary: Created comprehensive documentation for TikTok script frameworks starting with a directory index and framework overview, followed by detailed first-framework template (unboxing). Used hierarchical, modular approach with decision matrices, timing breakdowns, examples, and customization guidance.
key_achievements: Established script framework library structure with 5 planned frameworks
Documented universal script structure applicable across all content types
Created first complete framework (unboxing) with 585-line comprehensive template
Defined performance metrics and testing methodology
Provided audience segmentation and content selection guidance
approach_outcome.scope: Partial library - unboxing framework complete, 4 additional frameworks marked 'Coming Soon' (comparison, tutorial, story-driven, review)

recommendations.rationale: Four frameworks marked 'Coming Soon' need implementation to complete the library; prioritize comparison and tutorial frameworks next as they cover most use cases

recommendations.recommendation: Add video examples and case studies
recommendations.rationale: Current documentation is text-only; embedding/linking to actual example videos would dramatically improve learning and application
Content creators need quick guidance during production; a 1-page PDF summary of framework selection and timing breakdowns would increase framework adoption
Selection matrices could be converted to interactive quiz or tool that guides creators to right framework based on product/goal; would reduce decision paralysis
Documentation hints frameworks are combinable but provides no guidance; document how to layer frameworks (e.g., story-driven opening + tutorial middle + comparison ending)
Metrics defined but no tracking tool provided; create spreadsheet template for creators to log performance data and identify patterns
